long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple and efficient note-taking extension
- Create and save notes with automatic persistence
- Insert current tab URL into notes
- Copy individual notes or all notes at once
- Delete individual notes or clear all notes
- Drag and drop notes to reorder
- Collapsible notes with expand/collapse functionality
- Automatic URL detection and link conversion
- Checkbox for marking notes as completed
- Real-time date and time display
- Edit notes inline with textarea support
- Pastel color themes for notes
- Keyboard accessibility support
- Confirmation dialogs for destructive actions
- Clean, minimalist interface
- Responsive textarea that adjusts to content
- Toggle between popup and window modes
- Flexible window sizing and positioning

*Your notes are not saved to any third party database -- only on Chrome's local storage for security purposes and offline access.

V1.0.1
- Fixes an issue where a deleted note reappears when the extension is closed and reopened
- UI enhancements


V2.1.0
- Added functionality: Toggle between popup and window modes
- Flexible window sizing and positioning
- UI enhancements
